snippet.title: UCHUSEN debut in PLOID SAGA
snippet.description: Hello PLOIDS! The 4th game that we will add to the #PLOIDsaga bundle will be a vitaminized version of our #NES game with #Shootemup gameplay called #Uchusen! It will be a free update that you will receive during the 1st month of release!

localized.description: Hello PLOIDS! The 4th game that we will add to the #PLOIDsaga bundle will be a vitaminized version of our #NES game with #Shootemup gameplay called #Uchusen! It will be a free update that you will receive during the 1st month of release!
